item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gone-tomorrow/#comment-661">Darci</a>.
Thanks, Darci! It's Rebel by MAC with a mattifying powder over the top. I really had to wrack my brain to remember what it was! It came to me just as I was starting to go crazy. Whew!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Darci.

Thanks, Darci! It’s Rebel by MAC with a mattifying powder over the top. I really had to wrack my brain to remember what it was! It came to me just as I was starting to go crazy. Whew!

item.title: By: Darci
item.dc:creator: Darci
item.description: What lip color is that?? It's gorgeous!
item.content:encoded: What lip color is that?? It’s gorgeous!

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gone-tomorrow/#comment-653">Sarah Cosper</a>.
Supposedly the henna won't fade out...we'll see. I am the opposite of no-poo, I gotta scrub my hair once a day or I feel grungy, so my red always fades out to basically my natural color.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah Cosper.

Supposedly the henna won’t fade out…we’ll see. I am the opposite of no-poo, I gotta scrub my hair once a day or I feel grungy, so my red always fades out to basically my natural color.

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gone-tomorrow/#comment-651">Suzi</a>.
Good luck! I had bright red hair for a minute a few years ago, and I never would have kept it as long as I did if I hadn't worked at a salon back then.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Suzi.

Good luck! I had bright red hair for a minute a few years ago, and I never would have kept it as long as I did if I hadn’t worked at a salon back then.

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: I'm to that point even just trying to keep my hair red...I can't imagine the upkeep with blue! You're a stronger woman than I am, although, as stated above that blue looked amazing on you. This weekend I'm giving henna a shot for the first time to get a red that won't immediately fade out. I did a test run on some hair from my brush last week and it seemed to go okay, so I guess we'll see. If it ends badly, I'm joining you on TEAM WIG!
item.content:encoded: I’m to that point even just trying to keep my hair red…I can’t imagine the upkeep with blue! You’re a stronger woman than I am, although, as stated above that blue looked amazing on you. This weekend I’m giving henna a shot for the first time to get a red that won’t immediately fade out. I did a test run on some hair from my brush last week and it seemed to go okay, so I guess we’ll see. If it ends badly, I’m joining you on TEAM WIG!
